passive.name: LIGHTSLINGER
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) LIGHTSLINGER
                                After using an Ability, Lucian's next attack within 3.5 seconds will fire two shots.The second shot deals 40/52.5/65% (increasing at Level 1/6/11) physical damage, increased to 100%   against minions. The second shot is a separate Attack that deals on-hit effects and can critical strike.Vigilance: When healed or shielded by allied champions, or when a nearby enemy champion is immobilized, Lucian's next two attacks deal an additional 20 magic damage (20 + 10% )  (stores up to four empowered attacks).

q.name: (Q) PIERCING LIGHT
q.description:
(Q) PIERCING LIGHT
 9.5/8/6.5/5s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for 90 physical damage (90/135/180/225 + 65/85/105/125% bonus ).Decreases as attack speed increases (fastest when the bonus attack speed reaches 140%).

w.name: (W) ARDENT BLAZE
w.description:
(W) ARDENT BLAZE
 13/11.5/10/8.5s   70 
                                
                                
                                Fires a shot that explodes at the end of its range or on the first enemy hit, dealing 75 magic damage (75/125/175/225 + 90% ). briefly revealing enemies and marking them for 6 seconds.When Lucian or an ally damage a market enemy, Lucian gains 65/70/75/80 Movement Speed for 1 second. When allied champions trigger the mark, it grants Lucian Vigilance.
notes: range or on the first enemy hit, dealing 75 magic damage (75/125/175/225 + 90% )

e.name: (E) RELENTLESS PURSUIT
e.description:
(E) RELENTLESS PURSUIT
 20.5/18/15.5/13s   45/30/15/0 
                                
                                
                                Quickly dashes a short distance.Cooldown is reduced by 1 second whenever Lucian hits an enemy with Lightslinger (2 seconds for champions).

r.name: (R) THE CULLING
r.description:
(R) THE CULLING
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires rapidly in a direction for 3 seconds. Each shot deals 36 physical damage (20/40/60 + 25%  + 10% ) to the first enemy hit. Total 729 physical damage.Number of shots: 22/26/30.Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during the Culling.Recast to cancel early.Minions take 200% damage from The Culling.
